channel.title: Connecting Core to Carloop
channel.description:
New to the whole car hacking field and want to tinker. Using the sparkcore v1.0 how do I connect this device to the carloop.
Sorry if this is a dumb question, I couldn't find the answer in the documentation already.
Thanks.

item.title: Connecting Core to Carloop
item.dc:creator: jvanier
item.description:
I added a page to the docs about hardware compatibility to clarify this for others too.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting Core to Carloop
item.dc:creator: alanm
item.description:
Hey there!
The Spark Core unfortunately does not have a CAN bus and therefore not entirely compatible with Carloop. You’ll need to order a Particle Photon to read/write CAN messages with Carloop.

Read full topic
